column2: #The first variable in our data set (after removal of id) is ‘diagnosis_result’ which is not numeric in nature. So, we start from 2nd variable. The function lapply() applies normalize() to each feature in the data frame. The final result is stored to prc_n data frame using as.data.frame() function
wbcd_n <- as.data.frame(lapply(wbcd[,2:31], scale, center = TRUE, scale = TRUE))
